summary: Provides functionality to load whole‑slide images via the cuCIM library and extract image patches at a user‑defined resolution, magnification level, or pyramid level, with options for channel ordering, data type, device placement, color mode, and parallel loading.
business_intent: Facilitates high‑performance preprocessing of large pathology slide datasets for AI, diagnostic, or research pipelines by delivering fast, configurable patch extraction on CPUs or GPUs.
